markdownRemark.html:
Via Kotaku

Activision has ticked off Courtney Love and No Doubt by letting unlockable avatars sing songs from other genres.”

Ms. Love was especially distraught when she saw her image singing good music.

frontmatter.title: Time for Your Easy Joke About Courtney Love
The Pontiac Silverdome was Sold for < $600k
